Key Match Events: Towhid Hridoy: 50 off 61 balls (2 x 4, 2 x 6)
MR Marsh: 50 off 37 balls (6 x 4, 3 x 6)
MR Marsh: 100 off 87 balls (11 x 4, 4 x 6)
MR Marsh: 150 off 117 balls (16 x 4, 7 x 6)
SPD Smith: 50 off 55 balls (3 x 4, 1 x 6)
Post-Match Reflections: Australia won by 8 wickets (with 32 balls remaining)
Mitchell Marsh was awarded the Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh: 306/8 in 50.0 overs (Mahedi Hasan 2, Taskin Ahmed 0)
Australia: 307/2 in 44.4 overs (Mitchell Marsh 177*, Steven Smith 63*)
Others: The match was played at the Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium, Pune
The match was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
Australia won 2 points and Bangladesh 0 points
